Class Planet

java.lang.Object
  Planet

public class Planet
extends java.lang.Object

The Planet class. Contains all data relating to a planet, a method to calculate its net acceleration due to other planets, and a method to calculate new speed and position.

Version:
1.0.1 28 Feb 2009
Author:
Robin Smith

          Create a planet.

 void reCalculate(java.util.ArrayList<Planet> planets)
          Calculate the instantaneous net acceleration on this planet due to a collection of other planets.

Planet

              double x0,

              java.awt.Color colour,
              int diameter,
              int xLimit,
              int yLimit)
Create a planet.

Parameters:
mass - Initial mass
x0 - Initial x-coordinate
y0 - Initial y-coordinate
vx0 - Initial x-velocity
xy0 - Initial y-velocity
colour - Colour the planet will be drawn in
diameter - Diameter the planet will be drawn with
xLimit - Max. allowed x-coordinate
yLimit - Max. allowed y-coordinate
